name: fropocalypse
description:
oh no! evil frogs have invaded frogworld and come here to destroy the earth.

you have 30 seconds until they destroy everything you've ever loved in your life.

but you can do something about it, your goal is to find the generator that is causing these evil frogs to spawn and make the situation even worse.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WEBGL2 doesnt support browsers  like: safari, microsoft edge, firefox and chromium.
